it.unitn.ing.jgraph
Class ThermalColorMap

java.lang.Object
  it.unitn.ing.jgraph.ThermalColorMap
public class ThermalColorMap
extends java.lang.Object

ThermalColorMap provides a mapping from a value to a Color.

ThermalColorMap

public ThermalColorMap(double min,
                       double max,
                       int colrsNumber,
                       boolean grayScale)
Initialize the color map with default thermal color map. Sets up ThermalColorMap for INDEXED access.

See Also:
Color

ThermalColorMap

public ThermalColorMap(int colrsNumber,
                       boolean grayScale)
Initialize the color map with default thermal color map. Sets up ThermalColorMap for INDEXED access.

See Also:
Color

ThermalColorMap

public ThermalColorMap(int[] red,
                       int[] green,
                       int[] blue)
Initialize the color map with int arrays of red, green, and blue. The arrays must be the same length. Sets up ThermalColorMap for INDEXED access.

Parameters:
red - Array of the red component 0 - 255.
green - Array of the green component 0 - 255.
blue - Array of the blue component 0 - 255.
See Also:
Color

ThermalColorMap

public ThermalColorMap(float[] red,
                       float[] green,
                       float[] blue)
Initialize the color map with float arrays of red, green, and blue. The arrays must be the same length. Sets up ThermalColorMap for INDEXED access.

Parameters:
red - Array of the red component 0.0 - 1.0.
green - Array of the green component 0.0 - 1.0.
blue - Array of the blue component 0.0 - 1.0.
See Also:
Color

ThermalColorMap

public ThermalColorMap(java.awt.Color[] colors)
Initialize the color map with an array of Color objects. Sets up ThermalColorMap for INDEXED access.

Parameters:
colors - Array of the Color objects.
See Also:
Color
